duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise, train, develop, and hold ramp employees responsible for safety, production, and attendance.
Set and maintain high standards for productivity, accuracy, customer service, organization, communication, cooperation, and safety.
Implement employee personal development plans and ensure continuing professional growth of department personnel.
Promote a positive, team-oriented work environment emphasizing employee involvement, pro-active communication, and inter-departmental cooperation.
Ensure all employees adhere to safety policies and procedures at all times.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
